mod_lesson_get_page_data.description: Return information of a given page, including its contents.

mod_lesson_get_pages.description: Return the list of pages in a lesson (based on the user permissions).

mod_lesson_get_pages_possible_jumps.description: Return all the possible jumps for the pages in a given lesson.

mod_lesson_get_questions_attempts.description: Return the list of questions attempts in a given lesson.

mod_lesson_get_user_attempt.description: Return information about the given user attempt (including answers).

mod_lesson_get_user_attempt_grade.description: Return grade information in the attempt for a given user.

mod_lesson_get_user_grade.description: Return the final grade in the lesson for the given user.

mod_lesson_get_user_timers.description: Return the timers in the current lesson for the given user.

mod_lesson_launch_attempt.description: Starts a new attempt or continues an existing one.

mod_lesson_view_lesson.description: Trigger the course module viewed event and update the module completion status.

mod_lti_get_ltis_by_courses.description: Returns a list of lti instances in a provided set of courses.

mod_lti_get_tool_launch_data.description: Return the launch data for a given external tool.

mod_lti_get_tool_proxies.description: Get a list of the tool proxies

mod_lti_get_tool_proxy_registration_requ.description: Get a registration request for a tool proxy

mod_lti_get_tool_types.description: Get a list of the tool types

mod_lti_is_cartridge.description: Determine if the given url is for a cartridge

mod_lti_view_lti.description: Trigger the course module viewed event and update the module completion status.

mod_page_get_pages_by_courses.description: Returns a list of pages in a provided list of courses, if no list is provided all pages that the user can view will be returned.

mod_page_view_page.description: Trigger the course module viewed event and update the module completion status.

mod_quiz_get_attempt_access_information.description: Return access information for a given attempt in a quiz.

mod_quiz_get_attempt_data.description: Returns information for the given attempt page for a quiz attempt in progress.

mod_quiz_get_attempt_review.description: Returns review information for the given finished attempt, can be used by users or teachers.

mod_quiz_get_attempt_summary.description: Returns a summary of a quiz attempt before it is submitted.

mod_quiz_get_combined_review_options.description: Combines the review options from a number of different quiz attempts.

mod_quiz_get_quiz_access_information.description: Return access information for a given quiz.

mod_quiz_get_quiz_feedback_for_grade.description: Get the feedback text that should be show to a student who got the given grade in the given quiz.

mod_quiz_get_quiz_required_qtypes.description: Return the potential question types that would be required for a given quiz.

mod_quiz_get_quizzes_by_courses.description: Returns a list of quizzes in a provided list of courses, if no list is provided all quizzes that the user can view will be returned.

mod_quiz_get_user_attempts.description: Return a list of attempts for the given quiz and user.

mod_quiz_get_user_best_grade.description: Get the best current grade for the given user on a quiz.

mod_quiz_process_attempt.description: Process responses during an attempt at a quiz and also deals with attempts finishing.

mod_quiz_save_attempt.description: Processes save requests during the quiz.This function is intended for the quiz auto-save feature.

mod_quiz_start_attempt.description: Starts a new attempt at a quiz.

mod_quiz_view_attempt_summary.description: Trigger the attempt summary viewed event.

mod_quiz_view_quiz.description: Trigger the course module viewed event and update the module completion status.

mod_resource_get_resources_by_courses.description: Returns a list of files in a provided list of courses, if no list is provided all files that the user can view will be returned.

mod_resource_view_resource.description: Trigger the course module viewed event and update the module completion status.

mod_scorm_get_scorm_access_information.description: Return capabilities information for a given scorm.

mod_scorm_get_scorm_attempt_count.description: Return the number of attempts done by a user in the given SCORM.

mod_scorm_get_scorm_sco_tracks.description: Retrieves SCO tracking data for the given user id and attempt number.

mod_scorm_get_scorm_scoes.description: Returns a list containing all the scoes data related to the given scorm id.

mod_scorm_get_scorm_user_data.description: Retrieves user tracking and SCO data and default SCORM values.

mod_scorm_get_scorms_by_courses.description: Returns a list of scorm instances in a provided set of courses.

mod_scorm_view_scorm.description: Trigger the course module viewed event and update the module completion status..

mod_survey_get_questions.description: Get the complete list of questions for the survey, including subquestions.

mod_survey_get_surveys_by_courses.description: Returns a list of survey instances in a provided set of courses, if no courses are provided then all the survey instances the user has access to will be returned.

mod_survey_submit_answers.description: Submit the answers for a given survey.

mod_survey_view_survey.description: Trigger the course module viewed event and update the module completion status.

mod_url_get_urls_by_courses.description: Returns a list of urls in a provided list of courses, if no list is provided all urls that the user can view will be returned.

mod_url_view_url.description: Trigger the course module viewed event and update the module completion status.

mod_wiki_edit_page.description: Save the contents of a page.

mod_wiki_get_page_contents.description: Returns the contents of a page.

mod_wiki_get_page_for_editing.description: Locks and retrieves info of page-section to be edited.

mod_wiki_get_subwiki_files.description: Returns the list of files for a specific subwiki.

mod_wiki_get_subwiki_pages.description: Returns the list of pages for a specific subwiki.

mod_wiki_get_subwikis.description: Returns the list of subwikis the user can see in a specific wiki.

mod_wiki_get_wikis_by_courses.description: Returns a list of wiki instances in a provided set of courses, if no courses are provided then all the wiki instances the user has access to will be returned.

mod_wiki_new_page.description: Create a new page in a subwiki.

mod_wiki_view_page.description: Trigger the page viewed event and update the module completion status.

mod_wiki_view_wiki.description: Trigger the course module viewed event and update the module completion status.

mod_workshop_add_submission.description: Add a new submission to a given workshop.

mod_workshop_evaluate_assessment.description: Evaluates an assessment (used by teachers for provide feedback to the reviewer).

mod_workshop_evaluate_submission.description: Evaluates a submission (used by teachers for provide feedback or override the submission grade).

mod_workshop_get_grades.description: Returns the assessment and submission grade for the given user.

mod_workshop_get_reviewer_assessments.description: Retrieves all the assessments reviewed by the given user.

mod_workshop_get_submission_assessments.description: Retrieves all the assessments of the given submission.

mod_workshop_get_submissions.description: Retrieves all the workshop submissions or the one done by the given user (except example submissions).

mod_workshop_get_user_plan.description: Return the planner information for the given user.

mod_workshop_get_workshop_access_informa.description: Return access information for a given workshop.

mod_workshop_get_workshops_by_courses.description: Returns a list of workshops in a provided list of courses, if no list is provided all workshops that the user can view will be returned.

mod_workshop_update_assessment.description: Add information to an allocated assessment.

mod_workshop_view_workshop.description: Trigger the course module viewed event and update the module completion status.

report_competency_data_for_report.description: Load the data for the competency report in a course.

report_insights_action_executed.description: Stores an action executed over a group of predictions.

report_insights_set_notuseful_prediction.description: Flags the prediction as not useful.

tool_analytics_potential_contexts.description: Retrieve the list of potential contexts for a model.

tool_lp_data_for_competencies_manage_pag.description: Load the data for the competencies manage page template

tool_lp_data_for_competency_frameworks_m.description: Load the data for the competency frameworks manage page template

tool_lp_data_for_competency_summary.description: Load competency data for summary template.

tool_lp_data_for_course_competencies_pag.description: Load the data for the course competencies page template.

tool_lp_data_for_plan_page.description: Load the data for the plan page template.

tool_lp_data_for_plans_page.description: Load the data for the plans page template

tool_lp_data_for_related_competencies_se.description: Load the data for the related competencies template.

tool_lp_data_for_template_competencies_p.description: Load the data for the template competencies page template.

tool_lp_data_for_templates_manage_page.description: Load the data for the learning plan templates manage page template

tool_lp_data_for_user_competency_summary.description: Load a summary of a user competency.
Load a summary of a user competency.
Load a summary of a user competency.

tool_lp_data_for_user_evidence_list_page.description: Load the data for the user evidence list page template

tool_lp_data_for_user_evidence_page.description: Load the data for the user evidence page template

tool_lp_list_courses_using_competency.description: List the courses using a competency

tool_mobile_call_external_functions.description: Call multiple external functions and return all responses.

tool_mobile_get_autologin_key.description: Creates an auto-login key for the current user. Is created only in https sites and is restricted by time and ip address.

tool_mobile_get_config.description: Returns a list of the site configurations, filtering by section.

tool_mobile_get_content.description: Returns a piece of content to be displayed in the Mobile app.

tool_mobile_get_plugins_supporting_mobil.description: Returns a list of Moodle plugins supporting the mobile app.

tool_mobile_get_public_config.description: Returns a list of the site public settings, those not requiring authentication.

tool_templatelibrary_load_canonical_temp.description: Load a canonical template by name (not the theme overidden one).

tool_usertours_complete_tour.description: Mark the specified tour as completed for the current user

tool_usertours_step_shown.description: Mark the specified step as completed for the current user
